root: ^Take everything we need! After that, we are free to leave!
^Woah! This is lighter than I expected, you sure this will do for the repairs?
^Of course! This is basic magic material, we can mould it to our liking.
^Well this went down without any problems, is everyone fine with carrying their share?
^This is fine... but I would like to rest for the night before we go home.
^Same, let's make a last fire before  going home.
^I cannot wait to go home with all the loot!
